definition: to depend on/to comply with or listen to sb/according to/in the light of

sentences.english: The lightest feet between heaven and earth, so that we vaguely hear the waves and the Ocean Waves.
sentences.chinese: 天地间最轻的脚步，使我们依稀听到浪潮和涛声。

sentences.english: Sunlight Rock and western-style houses hidden in the lush greenery on Gulangyu Islet, a tiny island off the coast of Xiamen, were faintly visible.
sentences.chinese: 阳光下的鼓浪屿，日光岩和绿林掩映的洋房依稀可见。

sentences.english: I've got a vague idea about where we first met.
sentences.chinese: 我依稀记得我们第一次相见的地方。

sentences.english: A grotto in the forest, leafy, dense and dark.
sentences.chinese: 在郁郁葱葱的森林中，一个洞穴依稀可见。

sentences.english: Vaguely as if surprised to find her standing in the water.
sentences.chinese: 却见依稀仿佛，她在水的中央。

sentences.english: Dimly morning breeze, faint twilight light, passing always have your companionship.
sentences.chinese: 依稀晨风，依稀暮光，掠过的总是有你的陪伴。

sentences.english: Dimly morning breeze, faint twilight light, passing always have your companionship.
sentences.chinese: 依稀晨风，依稀暮光，掠过的总是有你的陪伴。

sentences.english: I can barely remember a time when I didn't know how to read.
sentences.chinese: 我依稀记得那时并不太懂得如何阅读。

sentences.english: Far away the outline of the island is just discernible.
sentences.chinese: 远远的，那岛的轮廓依稀可见。

sentences.english: I can vaguely remember my first day at school.
sentences.chinese: 我还依稀记得我第一天上学的情景。

sentences.english: Inside a fallout of the fan, one is strong peach.
sentences.chinese: 屋内一柄落尘的扇子，依稀桃花正浓。

sentences.english: They procrastinate over their homework; I see them on the unemployment line.
sentences.chinese: 他们在功课上拖拉，我依稀看到他们挣扎在失业线上。

sentences.english: I was vaguely felt minibus people are shifting their attention to me.
sentences.chinese: 我当时依稀感觉到中巴车上的人都将目光投向了我。

sentences.english: Shen night sleep is only vaguely heard in the flowing water, Wuyuan.
sentences.chinese: 夜里睡的很沉，只依稀地听到水在流淌，呜咽。

sentences.english: Reading Chen Wenji's painting recalls me vaguely some blurred experience I had.
sentences.chinese: 读陈文骥的画，依稀若唤出我某次模糊了的经历。

sentences.english: Below the bridge we could just discern a narrow, weedy ditch.
sentences.chinese: 我们仅能依稀辨出桥下一条杂草丛生的窄沟。
